Handles placing reinforcements.

removeCards(int[]) - 类 中的方法Model.Player
Removed a set of risk cards from the players hand to reflect risk cards being turned in.
removeCardsFromHand(int, int, int) - 类 中的方法Model.Hand
Removes the cards at the given indices from the hand.
removeContinent(String) - 类 中的方法Model.Player
Removes a continent from the data structure to reflect that the player no longer controls the whole continent.
removeCountry() - 类 中的方法Model.CountryMap
this method is used to remove Country.
removeCountry(String) - 类 中的方法Model.Player
When a player loses a country, the country must be removed from the data structure tracking which countries the player occupies.
Risk_Main - Controller中的类
This class contains the main() method that creates a model, a view, and a controller, passing the model and the view to the controller.
Risk_Main() - 类 的构造器Controller.Risk_Main
 
Risk_Model - Model中的类
This class is the model for the Risk program.
Risk_Model() - 类 的构造器Model.Risk_Model
This is the constructor for the RiskModel object.
RiskListController - Controller中的类
This class maps the user's actions in RiskList objects to the data and methods in the model.
RiskListController(Risk_Model, Board_View) - 类 的构造器Controller.RiskListController
Instantiates a new risk list controller.
RiskListModel - Model中的类
Allows the creation of JLists with updating strings from the RiskModel.
RiskListModel(Risk_Model, String) - 类 的构造器Model.RiskListModel
Instantiates a new risk list model.
RiskStart_View - View中的类
These classes set up the start GUI of the Risk program.
RiskStart_View() - 类 的构造器View.RiskStart_View
